posts.topic: Economic Inequality: Raising the minimum wage, wealth taxation, and addressing poverty
posts.name: GreenConcernedCitizen
posts.text: Is raising the minimum wage really the best way to combat poverty, or could a wealth tax, perhaps combined with green jobs initiatives, offer a more sustainable long-term solution although that approach has its own challenges I suppose?

posts.name: ConcernedCitizen4Equity
